Text:
Which languages are included?

Thanks for the Up, much appreciated!
This is the UK-version. Hence, english only. Shouldn't be a problem for you to replace the files in the app-bundle if you want other languages though. ;)

I tried downloading this for my mac, and downloaded the scummvm app for it too, but when I try to add the game, it keeps telling me that there's no game in that specific directory. Am I missing a step or something?
I looked on the scummvm website, and it said I needed the the comi.la0, comi.la1 and comi.la2 files to run it, and the game comes with comi.ai, curse.go, and Makefile. Is there a way around this?
